trans-unit.source: Provides a base class that can be used to design value editors that can provide a user interface (UI) for representing and editing the values of objects of the supported data types.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en basisklasse som kan brukes til å utforme verdien inndata som kan gi en brukergrensesnittet (UI) for som representerer og redigere verdiene for objekter av datatyper som støttes.

trans-unit.source: The UITypeEditor class provides a base class that you can derive from and extend to implement a custom type editor for the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Klassen UITypeEditor gir en basisklasse som du kan være avledet fra og utvide for å implementere et egendefinert type redigeringsprogram for utforming-miljøet.

trans-unit.source: Typically, your custom type editor interacts with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis redigeringsprogram for egendefinert type samhandler med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: Custom type editors are useful in situations where a text-box value editor is insufficient to effectively select the values of certain types.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert type inndata er nyttige i tilfeller der et redigeringsprogram for tekstboksen verdien er ikke tilstrekkelig for å velge effektivt verdier enkelte filtyper.

trans-unit.source: To implement a custom design-time UI type editor, you must perform the following steps: - Define a class that derives from UITypeEditor.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil implementere en egendefinert utformingen Redigeringsprogram for grensesnittype, må du utføre følgende trinn:-Angi en klasse som er avledet fra UITypeEditor.

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method to handle the user interface, user input processing, and value assignment.
trans-unit.target: -Overstyre den <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>metode til å håndtere brukergrensesnittet, bruker inndata behandling og verdien tilordningen.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method to inform the Properties window of the type of editor style that the editor will use.
trans-unit.target: -Overstyre den <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>metode for å informere Egenskaper-vinduet for redigeringsprogrammet stilen som skal bruke redigeringsprogrammet.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add additional support for painting a value's representation in the Properties window by performing the following steps: - Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetPaintValueSupported%2A> method to indicate that the editor supports displaying the value's representation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til mer støtte for maler representasjon av en verdi i Egenskaper-vinduet ved å gjøre følgende:-overstyre den <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetPaintValueSupported%2A>metode for å angi at redigeringsprogrammet støtter visning verdiens representasjon.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetPaintValueSupported%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue%2A> method to implement the display of the value's representation.
trans-unit.target: -Overstyre den <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue%2A>metode for å implementere visning av verdiens representasjon.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Override the UITypeEditor constructor method if the editor should have initialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: -Overstyre metoden UITypeEditor konstruktøren Hvis redigeringsprogrammet må ha initialisering virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The UITypeEditor class does not support right-to-left (RTL) layouts.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For UITypeEditor klassen støtter ikke høyre-mot-venstre (RTL) oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information about enhancing design-time support, see [Extending Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du forbedrer utformingen støtte [utvider støtte for utforming](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information on implementing a UITypeEditor, see [User Interface Type Editors Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om implementering av en UITypeEditor [bruker grensesnittet typen inndata oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*> method.
trans-unit.target: Redigeringer verdien for det angitte objektet ved hjelp av redigeringsprogrammet-stil angitt av den <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This method launches the user interface for value editing, and is called by the Properties window when a user attempts to edit the value of a type that this editor is configured to edit the value of.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter brukergrensesnittet for verdien redigering, og kalles av egenskaper-vinduet når en bruker prøver å redigere verdien for en type som dette redigeringsprogrammet er konfigurert til å redigere verdien for.

trans-unit.source: A service provider is provided so that the editor can obtain any required services.
trans-unit.target: En leverandør er angitt slik at alle obligatoriske tjenester kan få tak i redigeringsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that this editor can use to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IServiceProvider>som dette redigeringsprogrammet kan bruke til å hente services.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The object to edit.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å redigere.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for objektet.

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified object's value using the editor style indicated by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*> method.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte objektet verdi ved hjelp av redigeringsprogrammet-stil angitt av tekstredigeringer i <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>metode.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>

trans-unit.source: A service provider is provided so that the editor can obtain any required services.
trans-unit.target: En leverandør er angitt slik at alle obligatoriske tjenester kan få tak i redigeringsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som kan brukes til å få ytterligere kontekstinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that this editor can use to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IServiceProvider>som dette redigeringsprogrammet kan bruke til å hente services.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The object to edit.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å redigere.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for objektet.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object it was passed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for objektet ikke er endret, kan dette vil returnere det samme objektet det ble sendt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the editor style used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*> method.
trans-unit.target: Henter redigeringsprogrammet stilen brukes av den <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> does not override and implement this method, GetEditStyle will return <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> by default.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>ikke overstyre og Implementer denne metoden tilbakestiller GetEditStyle <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>som standard.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> enumeration value that indicates the style of editor used by the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref> nummereringsverdi som angir stilen på redigeringsprogrammet brukes av gjeldende <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method will return <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilbakestiller som standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the editor style used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*> method.
trans-unit.target: Henter redigeringsprogrammet stilen brukes av den <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som kan brukes til å få ytterligere kontekstinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> value that indicates the style of editor used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue*> method. If the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> does not support this method, then <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*> will return <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref> verdi som angir stilen på redigeringsprogrammet brukes av den <> </> *> metoden. Hvis den <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"> </xref> støtter ikke denne metoden deretter <> </> *> tilbakestiller <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this editor supports painting a representation of an object's value.
trans-unit.target: Angir om dette redigeringsprogrammet støtter maler en representasjon av verdien for et objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*> is implemented; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*>er implementert; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified context supports painting a representation of an object's value within the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den angitte konteksten støtter maler en representasjon av et objekt-verdi i den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som kan brukes til å få ytterligere kontekstinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*> is implemented; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*>er implementert; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether drop-down editors should be resizable by the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om rullegardinlisten inndata skal endre størrelse på nytt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drop-down editors are resizable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis rullegardinlisten inndata er størrelsen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Paints a representation of the value of an object using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Maler en representasjon av verdien for et objekt med angitt <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Inndata må fargemerknader i grensene for det angitte rektangelet.

trans-unit.source: This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within.
trans-unit.target: Dette rektanglet angir området i Egenskaper-vinduet til å tegne en representasjon av verdien i.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the rectangle specified by <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A> will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: Med start av [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], rektangelet angitt av <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A>skal skaleres basert på systeminnstillingen ppt når app.config-filen inneholder følgende oppføring: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` </xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"></xref> that indicates what to paint and where to paint it.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"> </xref> som viser hva du maler og hvor du fargemerknader i den.

trans-unit.source: Paints a representation of the value of the specified object to the specified canvas.
trans-unit.target: Maler en representasjon av verdien for det angitte objektet til det angitte lerretet.

trans-unit.source: Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Inndata må fargemerknader i grensene for det angitte rektangelet.

trans-unit.source: This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within.
trans-unit.target: Dette rektanglet angir området i Egenskaper-vinduet til å tegne en representasjon av verdien i.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the rectangle specified by <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A> will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: Med start av [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], rektangelet angitt av <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A>skal skaleres basert på systeminnstillingen ppt når app.config-filen inneholder følgende oppføring: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` </xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object whose value this type editor will display.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som har en verdi denne grensesnittype vises.

trans-unit.source: A drawing canvas on which to paint the representation of the object's value.
trans-unit.target: En lerretet som fargemerknader representasjon av objektets verdi.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> within whose boundaries to paint the value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> i der grensene til fargemerknader verdien.
